name: WiredTutor
description: Wired Tutor is a platform that connects students, tutors and institutions for the purpose of learning through the web and a mobile application. This platform guarantees every student the advantage to learn on his or her own will through the internet with keen supervision and monitoring from qualified, well equipped teachers.

SDGs.evidenceText: We are integrating the Education into Technology that will help students get access to teachers around the community they live.
